data.text:
Great apart hotel located directly at Marina Gate Dubai. The studios and apartments are large and offer all the amenities you could wish for. The furnishings are harmonious, color-coordinated and everything is very clean. For people who like to cook their own meals or families with small children, this is a great alternative to the Jumeirah Hotel, which is located in the same block. The breakfast buffet offers a good selection of international dishes and those who want to be active afterwards can do so in the gym with great advice or use one of the pools on the sun deck, where you can also enjoy a wonderful view. All the staff are well trained and very friendly. And a note for amateur chefs, a store with a large display and selection is located in the same block. 
My last two visits will not be the last, good price for top service!
data.title: Good price for top location & performance!

data.text:
This is a late review because I lost my log in details but I have stayed in this Apartment twice now. One being in 2022 and another in Aigust 2023. There's a reason we come back because it's honestly amazing.

First time we came with our daughter who was 4 at the time and they went above and beyond with us and my daughter. Second time we came with our 1 year old and 5 year old at the time. They both loved the hotel. 

Its super clean, friendly, breakfast is lovely, they gave an extra cot for my infant and a sofa bed for my older child.

Its right next to the Dubai Marina, walking distance from all shops and restaurants! 

Will definitely recommend and come here again!
data.title: Best Hotel by the Dubai Marina

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Keiran D.

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we are thrilled to hear that you've stayed with us twice and that you've had such wonderful experiences both times.

We are glad to hear your family enjoyed the amenities and our Team made your stay memorable. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to our team members, as they will be delighted to hear that their efforts are appreciated. 

We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Kind regards, 

Jan Valasek
General Manager
Jan.Valasek@jumeirah.com

data.text:
We stayed at Marina gate for 5 days, it was a great experience. The apartment offered great spaces, it was very clean and comfortable and everyone from the staff was really helpful and kind. 
The living room and and the main bedroom offered a wonderful view on Dubai Marina canal and the buildings around.
data.title: living with a view

user_location.name: Reggio Emilia, Province of Reggio Emilia, Emilia-Romagna

data.text:
To start with the positive: 
We had lovely, personal service from both miss Dayu at the Amara lounge as well as from our house keeper Mr. Yousef. They are keepers! Also the apartment we stayed at was very functional and clean and the pool a nice addition for our family. Location also practical with Carrefour down stairs and direct access to the Marina walk. 

However, we had several misfortunate encounters during our stay starting from the arriving to the hotel. We arrived late at night with two small children. I had in advance contacted the hotel to ensure the sofa bed is readily made for the kids to go straight to bed. When going up to the room this was not the case. At that point being tired myself as well I went back down to the reception and was visible upset about the situation. The reception sent someone to fix the bed, but none the less it made a delay to the kids bedtime and a bad start to our stay. At no point later during our stay was this mistake addressed again by the hotel staff. 

The whole trip was a surprise to my husband turning 40 during our stay in the hotel. I had informed the hotel also about this in advance asking for restaurant recommendations for his birthday. My son (6 years old) even spontaneously mentioned his dad's birthday to an employee the day before, but came his birthday was it in no way recognized by the hotel. I did not except much, but it would have been common curtesy in my opinion to leave at least a note to the room. Would have been an easy way to delight your customer.

As mentioned earlier, the room was nice and clean, however it was very irritating that although we had booked a room for 4 people we had to all the time request for cutlery, plates and towels for 4 people as the standard equipment level was for 2.

The reception not once made us feel welcome or recognized us properly when passing by. We ourselves had to look for an eye contact and be the ones to proactively greet the staff at the counter. Once even our two children happily (and loudly) said "Hi" to the 3 people behind the reception counter without getting any reply. This is really a point of improvement!

We will definitely be back to Dubai as a family and even though Jumeirah Living Marina Gate worked well when it comes to facilities, there was plenty of room for improvement when it comes to the hospitality. Thus, we most likely will choose somewhere else to stay.
data.title: Mixed feelings - hospitality leaves room for improvement

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Emmi Lyly,

Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed feedback regarding your recent stay at Jumeirah Living Marina Gate. We are glad you enjoyed the service from our staff we will pass on this message to our team as well as the cleanliness and functionality of the apartment and our facilities.

We regret to learn about the misfortunate encounters you experienced during your stay, please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Rest assured, your feedback has been noted, and we will take steps to address these issues to prevent any recurrence in the future.

Your feedback is important to us as and enhance the overall guest experience. We genuinely hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, and when you do return, please rest assured that your comments have been noted in your file. We are committed to making your next stay with us more enjoyable and memorable.

Once again, thank you for sharing your thoughts with us, and please feel free to reach out if there is anything else we can assist you with.

Kind Regards,
Rafael Gonzalez
General Manager
rafael.gonzalez@jumeirah.com
owner_response.author: Chatline Bulaclac
